#[derive(Accounts)]

    #[account(init, payer = provider_authority, space = EducationalProvider::space())]

tasks.name: NFT Credential Minting Implementation
tasks.description: Implement complete NFT credential minting functionality, associating credential data with NFTs, supporting minting of endorsed credentials as NFTs to student wallets. Integrate Metaplex Token Metadata standard with rich metadata storage support.
tasks.notes: Ensure only credentials with Endorsed status can mint NFTs. NFT metadata should include complete credential information including title, description, skills, IPFS hash, etc. Minted NFTs should be non-transferable soulbound tokens.

relatedFiles.description: Extend credential handlers to add NFT minting functionality
Credential state structure containing nft_mint field
Credential status enum including Minted state

tasks.implementationGuide:
Add NFT minting functionality in programs/fair-credit/src/handlers/credential_handlers.rs:

1. Create MintCredentialNFT account structure:
```rust
#[derive(Accounts)]
pub struct MintCredentialNFT<'info> {
    #[account(mut)]
    pub credential: Account<'info, Credential>,
    #[account(init, payer = payer, mint::decimals = 0, mint::authority = mint_authority)]
    pub nft_mint: Account<'info, Mint>,
    #[account(init, payer = payer, associated_token::mint = nft_mint, associated_token::authority = student_wallet)]
    pub nft_token_account: Account<'info, TokenAccount>,
    /// CHECK: Metadata account
    pub metadata_account: UncheckedAccount<'info>,
    #[account(mut)]
    pub payer: Signer<'info>,
    pub student_wallet: SystemAccount<'info>,
    pub token_program: Program<'info, Token>,
    pub associated_token_program: Program<'info, AssociatedToken>,
    pub token_metadata_program: Program<'info, TokenMetadata>,
    pub system_program: Program<'info, System>,
}
```

2. Implement mint_credential_nft function
3. Integrate create_metadata_accounts_v3 instruction
4. Update credential status to Minted
5. Register new handler in main program
